unittitle_ssm: Veronica Kieffer Brooklyn Navy Yard photograph and badge
abstract_ssm: The Veronica Kieffer Brooklyn Navy Yard photograph and badge consists of one black-and-white photograph of Kieffer and three other female employees of the New York Naval Shipyard (commonly referred to as the Brooklyn Navy Yard) taken while visiting Coney Island circa 1944; and Kieffer's identification badge from the Navy Yard, circa 1945.
